name: Forza Motorsport
summary: Forza Motorsport is a racing video game developed by Turn 10 Studios and published by Microsoft for the Xbox gaming system. The word Forza is Italian for force or strength. The game is the first installment in the Forza Motorsport series.
info:
• 中文名: 极限竞速
  • 开发: Turn 10 Studios
  • 发行: Microsoft Game Studios、Xbox Game Studios
  • 平台: Xbox
  • 游戏类型: RAC
  • 发行日期: 2005年05月03日
